abstractText: Herbaceous height is measured with a graduated rod or similar device in 10ths of feet (0.10 ft.). Only leaf material is measured. Leaf material may include residual cover and/or new growth predicated on Habitat Evaluation Program (HEP) model variable requirements. Grass/herbs inflorescences are not included in height measurements. Although there are a number of procedures to estimate the height of herbaceous vegetation, the following technique is the primary method utilized by the Regional HEP Team.
title: Herbaceous Vegetation Height v1.0
